div.h1:
Oyster River Cooperative School District
Proudly serving the communities of Durham, Lee, Madbury, and welcoming the Barrington HS Tuition Students Phone: 603-868-5100

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.br:
All Oyster River Schools are closed until
Monday, May 4th, 2020, for remote learning.

div.h2: Working Together To Engage Every Learner

div.div: The Oyster River Cooperative School District serves the contiguous town communities of Durham, Lee, and Madbury, located 50 miles north of Boston in the southeast corner of New Hampshire. The district is 12 miles west of Portsmouth and the Atlantic Ocean beaches, and 40 miles southeast of the White Mountains, offering four-season recreational activities and immediate proximity to the state’s Lakes Region. The University of New Hampshire (UNH) is located in Durham. As a result of its geographical location, the district and its students have easy access to many cultural and educational opportunities.
